column1: Figure 2. Prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, December 31, 1978–2015
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2015
Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician,  Elizabeth Anderson, BJS Intern
Figure 2. Prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, December 31, 1978–2015
Note: Jurisdiction refers to the legal authority of state or federal correctional officials over a prisoner, regardless of where the prisoner is held.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 1978–2015.
